detail_desc: Fleece-lined jacket in a patterned weave with a stand-up collar. Detachable hood with covered elastication, a zip with a chin guard and wind flap down the front with a hook and loop fastening. Zipped front pocket and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a sequined motif on the front. Long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood and zip down the front. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details. Low waist, zip fly and button and frayed, raw-edge hems.
Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections and a racer back. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with covered elastication, a small frill trim and decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Fine-knit liner socks designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have a ribbed section in the middle of the foot and elastication around the openings for optimum comfort.

Calf-length draped mesh dress with frills and support panels at the top. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip in the side, seam at the waist and flared skirt in three layers of tulle with decorative frills. Satin lining.
Fully lined, patterned bikini with frills. Top with an adjustable tie at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back.
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut jacket in sturdy cotton twill with a collar, yoke and press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with tabs and metal D-rings at the cuffs, and a fringed hem. Unlined.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with a gathered neckline and short puff sleeves.

Stylish, ankle-length trousers in a sturdy Tencel™ lyocell and wool weave with a sheen. Regular waist with a concealed waistband, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, diagonal side pockets and straight legs with creases.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed viscose jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Cardigan in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with a round neck and buttons down the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons at the back of the neck and a longer layer in woven fabric at the hem.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Trousers in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and slim legs with a concealed zip at the hems.
Lined triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with an appliqué on the front and a decorative seam and short slit at the back.
V-neck blouse in woven fabric with 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with a slit.
Sleeveless top in printed cotton jersey with a frill around the armholes.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a V-neck front and back, decorative crossover straps at the back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Sleeveless, calf-length jersey dress in a modal and cotton blend with a twisted seam with a slit at the front.
Caps in cotton twill with a print motif. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Cotton lining.
Metal studs in various designs, some decorated with rhinestones. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.

Ankle-length, seamless yoga tights in fast-drying fabric with a wide waistband and gathers at the knees for increased mobility. Wide ribbing at the hems. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit.

Narrow, adjustable waist belt in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with a metal buckle. Two fixed pouches, one larger and one smaller with fasteners. Width of belt approx. 1.3 cm. Size of larger pouch approx. 10x17 cm. Size of smaller pouch approx. 10x10 cm.
Mittens in a soft knit with ribbed, foldover cuffs and a fleece lining. Size 0-6M without thumbs.
Fitted one-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with one shoulder strap.
Treggings in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Jumper in a textured cotton knit in a relaxed fit with gently dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
High-waisted skirt in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button and front and back pockets. The skirt is made partly from recycled cotton.
Round-necked T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey.

Wide, calf-length dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with ties at the neck and a V-shaped opening at the front. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the hips and at the hem of the skirt for added volume. Lined with a detachable V-neck underdress in jersey. The underdress has narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. The polyester content of the outer fabric of the dress is partly recycled. The polyester content of the underdress is recycled.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in stretch twill with a zip fly and button and skinny legs.

Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a text print and embroidered appliqué. Jersey-lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Skirt in stretch jersey with wide ribbing at the waist for optimum fit over the tummy. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Set in cotton with a sleeveless corduroy dress and a pair of fine-knit tights. Dress with decorative bows on the front and a press-stud on each shoulder. Lined at the top. Tights with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the dress and tights is organic.
Trousers in a sturdy, patterned jacquard weave with a high waist, fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake welt pockets at the back and tapered legs with creases.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Satin trainers with elastic gores in the sides, a contrasting colour loop at the back and decorative frill at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder, lapped ribbing at the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Thin metal chain necklaces with pendants, one with a round metal pendant and the other with a plastic bead pendant. Adjustable length 43-51 cm and 50-58 cm.
Lined bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.
Round-necked dress in a cotton weave with an embroidered motif. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a seam at the top with decorative gathers and wide sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Baby Exclusive. Garter-stitched all-in-one suit knitted in soft organic cotton with buttons on one shoulder and at the crotch. Raglan sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with a drawstring hood and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Pyjama bottoms in jersey made from a viscose blend with a soft, brushed finish. Elasticated, drawstring waist and straight, wide legs.
Skinny-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Jumper in a soft knit containing glittery threads with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sports bag in a quilted weave made from recycled polyester with a wide, adjustable shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.
Pyjamas with a top and pair of shorts in soft jersey. Straight-cut top with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides of the hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Shaping bikers in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset, longer legs and laser-cut edges. Light shaping effect on the waist, bum and hips.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Kaftan in an airy, patterned weave with a slight sheen. Small opening with a covered button at the top, and a narrow tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Oversized trousers in twill made from a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell blend. High waist with pleats, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the waist. Side pockets, fake back pockets and wide legs with wide, sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide legs that taper to the hem.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a wrapover V-neck, seam at the waist with pleats at the front and a tie belt, and buttoned cuffs.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with large patch front pockets and straight, gently tapered legs. Elasticated, drawstring waist with a wide jersey panel for best fit over the tummy.
Court shoes with pointed toes and block heels. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in imitation leather with metal studs. Narrow cut at the top and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Plastic water bottle with a screw top and practical wrist strap that also holds the top in place. Capacity 550 ml.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some alpaca wool with a polo neck and dropped shoulders.

Blouse in chiffon with a round neckline with a lace-embroidered trim and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with smocking over the wrists. Partly lined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
